name: templateview
description: A React and Marionette inspired Backbone.js View for Template Designers.

scripts.start: npm run server & npm run sync
scripts.update: cd www && sed -i.bak 's;templateview.js;vendor/templateview/templateview.js;g' index.html && rm index.html.bak
scripts.deploy: rm -rf todo/vendor && bower install && npm run copy && npm run update && git checkout --orphan gh-pages && git rm -rf . && git add www && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix=www origin gh-pages && git checkout develop && git branch -D gh-pages && rm -rf www
scripts.convert: cd www && sed -i.bak $'s/    /	/g' script.js && rm script.js.bak
scripts.todomvc: npm run copy && npm run update && npm run convert && rm -rf ../todomvc/examples/templateview && cp -r www ../todomvc/examples/templateview && rm -rf www

author: Howard Roark
